title: Jessie J wins China singing competition
text: The singer swapped the judge's chair for performing as a contestant on TV show Singer.

title: UK PM apologises to Caribbean leaders
text: Theresa May says the Windrush children have a right to be in the UK and will not be deported.

title: The unlikely Boston marathon runner-up
text: Sarah Sellers, a full-time nurse, shocks America by winning $75,000 second place prize.

title: It's all going downhill

title: Chemical inspectors allowed into Douma
text: Experts are to be allowed access to the site of an alleged chemical attack in Syria on 7 April.

title: Panic on US jet after engine 'explosion'
text: A woman was reportedly "partially sucked out" of a window after it was pierced by engine debris.

title: Stepan's Birthday
text: Let the birthday celebrations begin! Your friends will be delighted when they receive these high-quality, full-screen animated birthday cards. And with a wide array of online birthday cards to choose from, you'll find many ways to make them smile.
